game.name: Fadeland: Fight Clubs
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fight. Earn. Build. In Fadeland, your fists shape your future. Engage in bloody battles, collect rewards, and create your dream life in an open world
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight. Earn. Build. In Fadeland, your fists shape your future. Engage in bloody battles, collect rewards, and create your dream life in an open world
